item.title: Fan Arts
item.description:
The wall of fan arts I have received! :333

If you wanna draw my character, go here! I might miss some but hopefully not!

WIP

item.title: Arts
item.description:
This is where I showcase my arts and stuff! (Not all of them tho) You may get the chance to get drawn if you have an oc that I think is simple enough and is drawable for me :3c You can find all of my arts in my Bluesky in socials.

Info Art
Mr. Triangle by ? and Simon by @totallyappa.bsky.social Grayscale Doodle of Mr. Triangle and Simon.
Dummie the Testing Dummy by @fav33.bsky.social Dummie shyly looking at the viewer sitting on ice. He is also shivering a little bit due to the icy environment.
blue.. :: Pocky by @bun0nthemoon.bsky.social Pocky is sitting in front of some gray pillar. It’s a dark blue open field world thing that I just felt like doing :p
Funny Doods :: (Outeki by @outeki.bsky.social, Jacadamia by @jacadamia.com and playte(discord) Funny doodle featuring Jacadamia, Outeki and Plate (used to be one of my discord members)
doodle test :: @stevinrith.bsky.social Stevinrith’s Discord pfp redrawn by me
tv person,,bshsj i see purple, i draw purple!!1 :: ‪@nexusnb.bsky.social‬ Non-Binary Nexus TV
mof kity :3 :: Aqua the Catmoth and Archie the Tailmaw by @voltthefox.bsky.social Aqua the catmoth and Archie the tailmaw drawn together. He’s literally -3- The background is a pixelated 2 shaded blue
Chai blocking your camera :: Chai by @axoga.to Chai looking, blepping and blocking the camera view, the background is a starry night, blurry. The caption says “Chai blocks your camera!”

item.title: Stuff I host/manage :3
item.description:
Under my Domain

Service Link
Iceshrimp (Fediverse) https://social.muppie.xyz
CatAsk https://ask.muppie.xyz
Vaultwarden https://vault.muppie.xyz

Game Servers

[Australia] SRB2 24/7 SUGOI (2.2.15)

IP: mc.artifyber.xyz:5030

Groggy Gale (MAPA3)

Lilac Conservatory (MAPAD)

Short Robotnik Park Gameplay (MAPAA)

A pretty fun big map pack made by TehRealSalt from the SRB2 community! The server features 21 different Lua and Character mods. The modlist may change from time to time.

item.title: Procrastination Sucks
item.description: Screw you procrastination! God, you really held me back for so long on making my website- ahem. Anyways! Yayyy I finally have my own website >w<!! Getting off straw.page now as im able to get more customizations and stuff! Though this isn’t the most for now, im tired lol. The straw.page may be taken down at some point but im lazy to update it right now. The stuff I host is also in here so yeye! Thanks to Linerly for motivating me enough to finally make my own website! This stuff is powered by Hugo btw, a static site generator.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello World! Mups here -w-

You can either call me Mups, Mupsie, or Muppie, whatever suits you! I’m a Gay Filipino boy, who likes and wants to be a cutie \uwu/! I use He/Him pronouns, and I am a really homosexual boy >w>. I don’t appear as a Femboy but I consider myself one. I’m also pretty soft-hearted and sensitive so please be patient and treat me gently. I promise im really nice and kind if you are to me! I also possibly am AuDHD.
